arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc CMakeFiles/image_player.dir/main.c.o CMakeFiles/image_player.dir/show_bmp.c.o CMakeFiles/image_player.dir/show_jpeg.c.o CMakeFiles/image_player.dir/show_png.c.o -o ../bin/image_player   -L/home/xiaoke/tools/tslib/lib  -L/home/xiaoke/tools/jpeg/lib  -L/home/xiaoke/tools/png/lib  -L/home/xiaoke/tools/zlib/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/home/xiaoke/tools/tslib/lib:/home/xiaoke/tools/jpeg/lib:/home/xiaoke/tools/png/lib:/home/xiaoke/tools/zlib/lib -lts -ljpeg -lpng -lz
